body:
Hi,

I wonder if you know these, I just found them:

Control Panel: http://squ1.com/node/201
Image Viewer:  http://squ1.com/node/1419

Usually I am not so much in Windows software, but these are even not
linked in radiance-online, and there is some folks working on
windows-boxes out there.

CU Lars.
subject: [Radiance-general] Free tools for Radiance/Windows: RadianceControl Panel and Image Viewer
